title: Welcome To JS-CMS!
body: JSCMS is Javascript based cms the generate static HTML pages that will be hosted on CDN Such as Github Pages Firebase etc   This features the ability to build your site without worrying about hosting performance or any issue related to the server  The CMS is Opensource with MIT License      If you want to contribute  please choose one or more of the following paths   Donate  support by donating  Task  Any open issue will help us improve the code  Code  you cannbsp      Enjoy
